channel.title: Bi on Glen C. Falk
channel.description: Recent content in Bi on Glen C. Falk

item.title: PowerBI Portfolio Analysis
item.description: Functioned as an R expert providing ReporteRs and rJava package support. Architected, deployed and maintained a sophisticated client reporting platform developed in R. Developed Tidyverse solutions to circumvent input validation issues and improve the data entry process resulting in a 50% improvement in Quarterly processing completion time. Built knowledge base of troubleshooting and development documentation. Thie BI visualizations are powered by R. Provided remote support and financial reporting expertise.
